attributes.action: Introduce chain gangs for convicted criminals instead of giving them the life of luxury in jail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country should be more like the US and introduce chain gangs and have the menaces of society contributing to this country, its about time these people were punished for their crimes rather than being allowed to live the easy life in jail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
